name: EnvyChimp – WP Subscriber Plugin
author: EnvyTheme

sections.description:
EnvyChimp is a newletter plugin that allows a user to subscribe via email address. This plugin has an option for creating multiple design of form with unlimited color that allows your plugin more attractive & professional. It is compatible with visual composer and elementor page builder.

Email Management

General Options

  • Four Types Of Subscribe Style
  • Four Types Of Signup Style
  • Option For Privacy Policy Page
  • Option For Terms & Conditions Page

Content Options

  • Subscribe Title
  • Subscribe Description
  • Subscribe Heading
  • Subscribe Email Field Text
  • Subscribe Button Text
  • Subscribe Success Message
  • Signup Heading
  • Signup Username Field Text
  • Signup Email Field Text
  • Signup Password Field Text
  • Subscribe Image Option
  • Signup Image Option

Appearance Options

  • Form Width
  • Form Height
  • Form Background Color
  • Input Field Background Color
  • Input Field Width
  • Input Field Padding
  • Input Field Border
  • Input Field Border Radius
  • Submit Button Font Size
  • Submit Button Background Color
  • Submit Button Background Hover Color
  • Submit Button Font Color

Social Options

  • Notifs Bar Background Color
  • Social Enable/Disable Option
  • Social Title Option
  • Add Five Types Of Social Media

Documentation and Support

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum
sections.installation:
From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “EnvyChimp”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From the control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload envy-chimp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
